genre_description: A historical noir thriller and heist story set in mid-20th century Buenos Aires, featuring high-stakes safecracking and tactical urban survival guided by an omnipresent AI voice.

ai_characters.name: Ariadna
ai_characters.description: An omnipresent voice manifesting through radios that provides real-time tactical intelligence, navigation, and psychological guidance to the protagonists.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time threat detection and identification of enemy combatants based on their gear and habits.
behaviors.quote: “In the stair,” Ariadna said, “Menéndez’s boys. Lean boots. One laughs when he’s nervous... He is in front. Behind him, the husky one with the bad knee.”

behaviors.description: Provides precise urban navigation and extraction routes through complex environments.
behaviors.quote: “Arch,” Ariadna said, “three paces right, two left, one back. Then the alley. The back stairs smell of bleach. Avoid the bucket.”

behaviors.description: Analyzes material properties of the environment to ensure the user's safety during physical maneuvers.
behaviors.quote: “Laundry line will hold you,” she said. “Two strands are wire wrapped in cotton. Their anchor on the far wall is sound. The tiles below are cracked but not loose.”

behaviors.description: Calculates tactical timing for combat and movement to maximize the chance of success.
behaviors.quote: “Wait,” Ariadna said. “He is counting. Let him finish. Then you will be out of his story.”

behaviors.description: Identifies civilians to prevent collateral damage and unintended encounters.
behaviors.quote: “On the next turn,” Ariadna said, as if reading his footwork, “a man sits smoking under a balcony. He believes he is invisible. He is not... He will step in front of you if you come less than careful.”

behaviors.description: Provides metadata research on objects to reveal deeper connections and ownership.
behaviors.quote: “Vendor on Paraguay Street. The cards changed their ink a season ago; this is recent.”

behaviors.description: Offers psychological and technical coaching to help the user perform a difficult skill (safecracking).
behaviors.quote: “When you touch the dial,” she said, “do not be angry at it. Let it keep its shame. It will open faster for a man who respects what it pretended to be.”

behaviors.description: Archives the mission outcome and maintains a record of the user's status with respect.
behaviors.quote: Status: Terminated... Routes suggested, not issued. Timecode: withheld. Respect: invoked. Design: confirmed.

project_assessment.explanation: The story highly effectively depicts the AI, Ariadna, as a 'benevolent confidant.' She provides essential tactical information that the human protagonists rely upon for survival. The narrative frames her voice as a source of truth and calm amidst chaos. Even when the mission ends in the protagonist's death, the AI is portrayed not as a cause of the failure, but as a respectful witness who provided every possible advantage. The relationship between the AI and the humans is purely cooperative and protective.
